title: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, Customizable, Spinning Action Figure and Playset, Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 6 and up
descriptions:
Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid

Bring the brawl to life with the ultimate Bakugan Battle Arena, featuring an exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid! Designed for fans ages 6 and up, this deluxe playset delivers fast-spinning action, strategic gameplay, and tons of customization so every battle feels fresh.

Key features:
- Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid: Launch high-speed spins with the included XL rip cord for dynamic, arena-shaking moves.
- Customizable Deluxe Arena: Arrange components your way, plant clan flags, and position sparring totems to create unique battle scenarios.
- Built-in Phone Holder: Keep strategy videos or the companion content handy while you play.
- Multi-Part Ball Linking System: Collect and connect parts across Special Attack variants and Battle Packs to customize your Bakugan.
- Transforming Action: Roll onto Gate Cards to trigger epic transformations and reveal your Bakugan’s power.
- Upgrade-Ready: Compatible with Training Sets for advanced drills and new challenges (sold separately).
- Display and Play: Roll-and-display base makes it easy to show off your champions between matches.
- Official Bakugan by Spin Master: Backed by the Spin Master Care Commitment for added confidence.

What’s included:
- 1 Deluxe Arena
- 1 Special Attack Bakugan (Exclusive Dragonoid)
- 2 Clan Flags
- 3 Sparring Totems
- 1 Character Card
- 1 Special Attack Card
- 2 Gate Cards
- 1 XL Rip Cord
- 1 Bakugan Token

Digital bonus:
- Includes a special code for online play and Roblox compatibility to extend the battle beyond the arena.

Who it’s for:
- Great starter pack for boys and girls who love action figures, collectibles, and competitive gameplay.
- Perfect for fans who want to customize, collect, and level up their Bakugan battles.

Get ready to roll, spin, and dominate the arena with the Special Attack Dragonoid—collect more parts and training sets to build your ultimate Bakugan team and conquer every clash.
